topic.title: guide stone agenda vs the shanghai defense alliance?
topic.body:
ted turner, bill gates, the pedos and co in the west seek to wipe us... to reach their 500 millions human alive... do you think they have a chance to win against the PLAoC (chinese army and security forces)?

I don't think so... close to 0.

topic.title: how to install WeChat on ios without the appstore?
topic.body:
fuck the appstore ! let us play the stupid epic game if we wish so, and fuck bluethoot emf battery emptying shit !!!

isn't there open source os to flash ios? what do you recommend?

1600417633_14DD49E4i7XTVfi8WqSuV47Nuo1T6.body:
thx... yeah I just don't want to reinstall each time... so if I wipe (or store in a little file my collection of user name) I don't expose too much data? maybe the fact that I have already downloaded some zsite?

maybe what I should do, is a fresh install... 

remove the user.json

do a clone of the vm

and reload each time a new vm...

or maybe a more updated system...

ps i ain't in a free speech zone... the antifreespeechnazi are all around... :(.
